headline: Will Lumentum (LITE) Board Refresh Sharpen Its AI Cloud Optics Strategy?
summary: On December 15, 2025, Lumentum Holdings appointed onsemi Chief Financial Officer Thad Trent to its Board and Audit Committee, with his initial term running through the 2026 annual shareholder meeting. Trent’s deep semiconductor finance and operations background, spanning Cypress Semiconductor and onsemi, adds additional oversight as Lumentum leans further into AI- and cloud-focused optics. Next, we’ll consider how Trent’s appointment and Lumentum’s AI cloud optics momentum may influence the...
